headline: Aptiv to Release Fourth Quarter 2024 Financial Results
summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN, Switzerland, January 03, 2025--Aptiv PLC (NYSE: APTV), will release its fourth quarter 2024 financial results on February 6, 2025 and will hold an investor call the same day at 8:00 a.m. EST. The call will be hosted by Aptiv's Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, Kevin Clark, and Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Varun Laroyia.

headline: Investors Heavily Search Aptiv PLC (APTV): Here is What You Need to Know
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.
